name: dryrun-validation
description: Complete workflow for re-running dryrun experiments, generating analysis outputs, and validating results against baseline
author: ProjectScylla
use_cases: Re-run dryrun experiments to validate reproducibility
Validate analysis pipeline after code changes
Verify tarfile integrity against fresh regeneration
Establish baseline metrics for experiment comparisons
key_learnings: Full model IDs required (not short aliases) for correct analysis loader regex matching
LLM variance: ±0.03-0.06 score delta, ±50-100% cost variance for single-run experiments
Use --exclude flag to isolate experiments when generating analysis
Marginal threshold violations (within 0.01) are acceptable due to LLM non-determinism
Tarfile validation: byte-for-byte CSV comparison + numeric precision < 1e-10
